p: For stained cells ( Figure 2), after fixation cells were permeabilised (PEM with 0.25% Triton-X-100) for 20 min (at 23°C), blocked with blocking buffer [5% Bovine Serum Albumin (BSA) in PEM] for 30 min (at 23°C), and stained with anti-CD4 mAb (OKT4, 6 μg/ml) for 60 min (at 23°C), followed by anti-mouse Alexa Fluor 568 secondary Ab (Molecular Probes) for 60 min (at 23°C).
